Home » 16A5 Pañcakanipātapāḷi » 5 Pañcamapaṇṇāsaka » 5.1 Kimilavagga
5.1.3 Assājānīyasutta
Pañcamapaṇṇāsaka
Kimilavagga
Assājānīyasutta
203.
1196“Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgato rañño bhadro assājānīyo rājāraho hoti rājabhoggo, rañño aṅgantveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
1197Katamehi pañcahi? Ajjavena, javena, maddavena, khantiyā, soraccena—  imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgato rañño bhadro assājānīyo rājāraho hoti rājabhoggo, rañño aṅgantveva saṅkhaṃ gacchati. Evamevaṃ kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassa.
1198Katamehi pañcahi? Ajjavena, javena, maddavena, khantiyā, soraccena—  imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu āhuneyyo hoti pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṃ puññakkhettaṃ lokassā”ti.
1199Tatiyaṃ.
